entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Baker Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 03:14 AM CST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Blowing Snow, -29.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Baker Lake Airport 1:00 PM CST Thursday 23 February 2023
Condition: Blowing Snow
Temperature: -29.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.2 kPa falling
Visibility: 0.6 km
Humidity: 68 %
Wind Chill: -50
Dewpoint: -33.9°C

Air Quality Health Index: N/A
